name: THE CAT (itch) (DennisByDEN., Mac&Cheesecake)
description:
Curiosity killed the cat, or, in this case, trapped it in an unknown world.

Now it has to pass 13 halls to get back home.

Solve puzzles, avoid bullets and dragons and collect coins on your journey back home.

Controls

  • WASD / arrow keys - move, select
  • Space - skip, select
  • M - mute
  • R - restart
  • Escape - quit, go back to main menu

I made this game with my friend Mac&Cheesecake!

If you like this game look at my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
